nodes.text: Sometime between 3973 BBY and 3965 BBY, during the early years of the conflict known as the Mandalorian Wars, the Mandalorian Neo-Crusaders invaded the Kaelta system, having captured the Quermia system previously. From the Kaelta system, the Mandalorians raided the Florn system.

The battle is only referenced once in The Essential Atlas. It is marked on a galactic map showing the course of the Mandalorian Wars rather than described in prose. In the Atlas, the Kaelta system is denoted as the "Toola system" after the planet of Toola, which it contains.
